page.title: 13COUNTRY DANCING
page.content: On Thursday June 6th ten schools took part in the{Country Dance {Festival}held at{Brookside Junior {School.}Due to the wet weather we had to dance in the two school halls. It was very cramped in the Infants Hall as there were dancing teams from four schools:-{Broadford, Pyrgo-Priory, {Dycourts, and Brookside}as well as many parents. After we had demonstrated each dance we also encouraged our parets to join in which proved great fun. Despite not having much room we all enjoyed ourselves. A slide showing the dancing can be seen by referring to{photograph C}in the photograph section of this program. Another slide was also buried in the{Time Capsule.}See page 14 of this text.
